React to your next attacker with flames that deal 2~20 Fire damage.

Hellish Rebuke is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Hellish Rebuke is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
